mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.house_no houseNo,p.car_no carNo,p.park_no parkNo,p.owner_one ownerOne,p.owner_two ownerTwo, p.phone_one phoneOne,p.phone_two phoneTwo,p.type, p.due_time dueTime,p.norm_id normId,p.area,p.genre FROM ht_park p LEFT JOIN ht_user_park up ON p.id=up.park_id LEFT JOIN ht_user u ON u.id=up.user_id WHERE u.openid=#{openid} AND p.is_del=0

SELECT id,house_no houseNo,car_no carNo,park_no parkNo,owner_one ownerOne,owner_two ownerTwo, phone_one phoneOne,phone_two phoneTwo,type,due_time dueTime,norm_id normId,area,genre FROM ht_park WHERE park_no=#{parkNo} AND is_del=0

SELECT id,house_no houseNo,car_no carNo,park_no parkNo,owner_one ownerOne,owner_two ownerTwo, phone_one phoneOne,phone_two phoneTwo,type,due_time dueTime,norm_id normId,area,genre FROM ht_park WHERE car_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carNo},'%') AND is_del=0

SELECT id,house_no houseNo,car_no carNo,park_no parkNo,owner_one ownerOne,owner_two ownerTwo, phone_one phoneOne,phone_two phoneTwo,type,due_time dueTime,norm_id normId,area,genre FROM ht_park WHERE house_no=#{houseNo} AND is_del=0

SELECT p.id,p.house_no houseNo,p.car_no carNo,p.park_no parkNo,p.owner_one ownerOne,p.owner_two ownerTwo, p.phone_one phoneOne,p.phone_two phoneTwo,p.type,p.due_time dueTime,p.norm_id normId,p.area,p.genre FROM ht_park p LEFT JOIN ht_user_park up ON p.id=up.park_id WHERE up.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT p.id,p.house_no houseNo,p.car_no carNo,p.park_no parkNo,p.owner_one ownerOne,p.owner_two ownerTwo, p.phone_one phoneOne,p.phone_two phoneTwo,p.type,p.due_time dueTime,p.norm_id normId,p.area,p.genre,p.notice_time noticeTime,u.openid FROM ht_park p LEFT JOIN ht_user_park up ON p.id=up.park_id LEFT JOIN ht_user u ON u.id=up.user_id WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,p.due_time,NOW())>3 AND (DATE_FORMAT(p.notice_time,'%Y-%m')!=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') OR p.notice_time IS NULL) AND u.openid IS NOT NULL
